name: Neogen Fallout
description:
A gloriously engaging and absorbing interactive piece of art. Not just one for the eyes but for the ears also as the soundtrack demands your attention as you feel the beat of the music deep in your soul – Crank up the volume!

***Featured in 46 Countries!!! in Best New Games and Best New Updates Categories.***

Neogen Fallout is a pure, minimalistic arcade game with neon lights, fluid gameplay and high speeds and all interacting as one with the mesmeric visual style and accompanying music.

Match the neon figures with the cells in the bottom and test your reaction in the abstract city of neon lights, shadows and glorious effects.

Now with NEW GROUND BREAKING features:

• 5 Modes: Classic, Madness, Shoot 'Em Up, The Wall, Teleport

• Real time dynamic changing of colours and shapes:
An in game algorithm that the games effects react to. Bouncing along to the beat of and sounds of ANY song, a delight for the senses.

• "YOUR MUSIC TRACK" Function
In the updated version CHOOSE ANY track from the game menu that is on your phone and watch what happens in game.

• Minimalist and abstract visuals
A slick and Minimalist UI that strays away from the norm of the usual endless arcade games with its stylish neon design and abstract city design.

* Absorbing interaction of music and game objects
* Abstract city of shapes and changing music
* Universal app, for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch
* Retina Display support
* Game Center leaderboards
* Challenge your friends to beat your score (iOS 6.0 and Game Center required)
* Requires iOS 6.0 or above
* Ost by NubbyCakums

[Controls]
Slide the shapes left and right to match them with the destination cells at the bottom of the screen

[Credits]
FredBear Games - Publishing, Supporting, Play Testing and Feedback;
ArmNomads - Design, coding and art;

Please leave a rating and review and give feedback where you can as we will be looking to update this game to further improve it.

FEEDBACK WELCOMED and will be actioned upon where feasible.
